questions.question: What is DragNUWA implemented in ComfyUI used for?
questions.answer: DragNUWA for ComfyUI enables users to manipulate backgrounds or objects within images directly and generates the corresponding video with seamless camera movements or object motions.

questions.question: How can I install the DragNUWA extension for ComfyUI?
questions.answer: Clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of the ComfyUI location, run pip install -r requirements.txt, download the weights of DragNUWA and place them in 'ComfyUI/models/checkpoints/drag_nuwa_svd.pth'.

questions.question: What tools are available in ComfyUI-DragNUWA?
questions.answer: The Motion Traj Tool is available for generating motion trajectories.

questions.question: What are the examples of workflows provided with ComfyUI-DragNUWA?
questions.answer: There are four examples of workflows provided: basic workflow, InstantCameraMotionBrush & InstantObjectMotionBrush, optical flow workflow, and motion brush.
